parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To enclose, shut in, make subject to. From sun and kleio; to shut together, i.e. Include or embrace in a common subjection to.
A multitude, crowd, great number, assemblage. From pletho; a fulness, i.e. A large number, throng, populace.
A fish. Of uncertain affinity; a fish.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A fishing-net. Probably from a primary verb diko; a seine.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To tear asunder, burst, rend. From dia and rhegnumi; to tear asunder.
